citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:31 PM on 11-
December-2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the facility door and speaking with family
member (non-authorized representative) who stated that the licensee was at work and unavailable for inspection. The
inspector also spoke to the licensee by phone and confirmed that he was unavailable for inspection. Failure to provide
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to
comply may result in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
Eric Irvin, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:31 PM on 11-
December-2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the facility door and speaking with family

inspector also spoke to the licensee by phone and confirmed that he was unavailable for inspection. Failure to provide
